properties.address: Carpenders Park Community Hall, Watford, Hertfordshire WD19 5EG
properties.description: Good Vibrations Watford will host a welcoming space at the Carpenders Park Community Hall this winter, offering warmth and comfort to the community. Visitors can enjoy a relaxed atmosphere with free food and drinks, opportunities to explore music, borrow or learn about instruments, and connect with others in a friendly environment. It’s a space for creativity, community, and warmth during the colder months.
properties.title: Carpenders pk community hall

properties.address: Carpenders Park & South Oxhey Methodist Church, Watford, Hertfordshire WD19 6LA
properties.description: Our Pop-Up Café is a welcoming, non-judgmental space created to foster community and connection. Open to everyone, regardless of background, culture, or race, it is a place where you can enjoy warmth, hospitality, and the opportunity to be yourself. Whether you’re looking for a friendly chat, a quiet moment, or just a cup of tea, our café provides a safe environment to relax and feel at home. We believe in the power of inclusion and kindness, offering a refuge where all can experience belonging and care. Join us on Mondays and Wednesdays (10am- 1230) and discover a community built on understanding, acceptance, and love. Everyone is welcome—just as they are!
properties.title: Pop-up-Café: A Warm Space for All
